DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this study is to determine feasibility and effects of tai chi and mind-body breathing in patients with COPD.
DOC.brief_title: BEAM COPD: Breathing, Education, Awareness and Movement in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
